description.english: Clear your first track on any difficulty
description.russian: Пройти свой первый уровень на любой сложности
description.brazilian: Complete seu primeiro nível em qualquer dificuldade
description.french: Complétez votre premier morceau dans n'importe quelle difficulté
description.german: Schließe deinen ersten Song auf irgendeinem Schwierigkeitsgrad ab

description.japanese: いずれかの難易度の最初のトラックをクリアする
description.spanish: Completa tu primera canción en cualquier dificultad

displayName.japanese: クリーンフィニッシュ

description.english: Finish any Normal level without taking damage
description.german: Schließe irgendein einfaches oder normales Level ab, ohne Schaden zu nehmen

description.koreana: 피해를 입지 않은 채 쉬움 또는 보통 난이도를 완료
description.spanish: Termina cualquier canción en Fácil o Normal sin recibir daño
description.schinese: 无伤完成一次简单或普通难度
description.tchinese: 無傷完成一次簡單或普通難度
description.russian: Пройти любой уровень на сложности "Легкая" или "Нормальная", не получив урона
description.japanese: イージーまたはノーマルのレベルをダメージを受けることなく完了する
description.brazilian: Complete qualquer nível Normal ou Fácil sem tomar dano

description.english: Attempt your first Hard level
description.german: Versuche dein erstes schweres Level
description.french: Tentez votre premier niveau en difficulté Difficile
description.italian: Prova a completare il tuo primo livello in difficoltà Difficile
description.spanish: Intenta una canción en dificultad Difícil
description.russian: Попробовать пройти уровень на сложности "Тяжелая"
description.japanese: ハードレベルに初挑戦する
description.brazilian: Tente seu primeiro nível Difícil

description.english: Complete any level only turning in one direction

description.japanese: 一方向にのみターンするレベルをどれでも完了する

description.tchinese: 一首曲目中只向一個方向轉動

description.english: Complete your first Hard level with an A rank or higher

description.english: Clear an Expert or XD level with track speed override set to 10

description.english: Miss only the last note of any level on any difficulty

description.english: Clear any level with "Hold mouse click to move" enabled

description.english: Clear 10 consecutive match or tap notes of the same color, type, and lane, using a different wheel wedge
description.german: Treffe 10 aufeinanderfolgende Match- oder Tap-Noten vom selben Typ, der selben Farbe und der selben Spur, während jeweils ein anderer Teil des Rades benutzt wird

description.koreana: 동일한 색상, 유형, 위치의 매치 또는 탭 노트 연속 10개를 각자 다른 휠 웨지로 처리하기

description.tchinese: 使用輪盤的不同區域, 成功擊中連續10個顏色、種類、所處軌道線相同的匹配或點擊音符
description.russian: В сумме попасть по 10 Match-нотам или Tap-нотам, которые одного цвета, типа, расположены на одной полосе подряд, используя разные секторы колеса
description.japanese: 異なるホイールの一角を使って、同じ色、タイプ、レーンの音符を10連続でマッチして消すか、タップする
description.brazilian: Acerte 10 notas de combinação ou de toque consecutivas da mesma cor, tipo e pista usando cunhas do disco diferentes

description.schinese: 完成任何难度下的所有曲目
description.spanish: Completa todas las canciones en cualquier dificultad
description.tchinese: 完成所有曲目的全部難度

description.english: Pass "Let Me Hear That" on any difficulty with music volume set to zero
description.russian: Пройти Let Me Hear That на любой сложности с громкостью музыки 0
description.brazilian: Complete "Let Me Hear That" em qualquer dificuldade com o volume em zero
description.french: Complétez "Let Me Hear That" sur n'importe quelle difficulté avec le volume de la musique sur zéro
description.german: Schließe "Let Me Hear That" auf irgendeinem Schwierigkeitsgrad ab, währenddessen deine Musik auf 0% eingestellt ist
description.italian: Completa "Let Me Hear That" in qualsiasi difficoltà con il volume dell'audio impostato a 0
description.japanese: いずれかの難易度の「Let Me Hear That」を音量をゼロにしてクリアする
description.koreana: 음량을 0으로 설정한 채 "Let Me Hear That" 아무 난이도를 통과
description.schinese: 音乐音量为0的情况下, 完成《Let Me Hear That》的任意难度
description.spanish: Termina "Let Me Hear That" en cualquier dificultad con el volumen a 0
description.tchinese: 音樂音量為0的情況下, 完成《Let Me Hear That》的任意難度

displayName.japanese: パーフェクトフルコンボ

description.english: Get a perfect full combo on any difficulty
description.russian: Получить PFC на любой сложности
description.brazilian: Consiga um PFC em qualquer dificuldade
description.french: Obtenez un Full Combo Parfait (PFC) dans n'importe quelle difficulté
description.german: Erhalte eine Perfekte volle Combo auf irgendeinem Schwierigkeitsgrad
description.italian: Ottieni una Perfect Full Combo in qualsiasi difficoltà
description.japanese: いずれかの難易度でパーフェクトフルコンボを達成する
description.koreana: 아무 난이도에서 퍼펙트 풀 콤보 달성
description.spanish: Obtén un Perfect Full Combo en cualquier dificultad

description.english: Fail, retry and then pass a song
description.russian: Провалить, а затем пройти уровень, попробовав еще раз
description.brazilian: Falhe, tente novamente e passe um nível
description.french: Ratez, réessayez puis réussissez un morceau
description.german: Verliere, starte neu und schließe den Song ab
description.italian: Fallisci, riprova e completa una canzone
description.japanese: 曲を失敗してから、再トライしてクリアする
description.spanish: Fracasa, reintenta y entonces completa una canción

description.english: Attempt any level on XD difficulty
description.russian: Попробовать пройти любой уровень на сложности XD
description.brazilian: Jogue qualquer nível na dificuldade XD
description.french: Essayez n'importe quel niveau en difficulté XD
description.german: Versuche irgendein Level auf dem XD Schwierigkeitsgrad
description.italian: Prova a completare qualsiasi livello in difficoltà XD
description.japanese: XD難易度のレベルに挑戦する
description.spanish: Intenta una canción en dificultad XD

description.english: FC Platform 9 and then FC The Magician
description.german: FC Plattform 9 und FC danach The Magician
description.french: Effectuez un FC sur Platform 9 puis un autre sur The Magician
description.italian: Ottieni una Full Combo prima in "Platform 9", poi in "The Magician"
description.koreana: "Platform 9" 풀 콤보 후 "The Magician" 풀 콤보
description.spanish: Obtén Full Combo en "Platform 9" y seguidamente obtén Full Combo en "The Magician"
description.russian: Получить FC на Platform 9, а затем FC на Magician
description.japanese: 「Platform 9」をFCしてから、「The Magician」をFCする
description.brazilian: Obtenha um FC em "Platform 9" e então um FC em "The Magician"

description.english: Pass Believe XD and This Is It XD in a row
description.russian: Пройти Believe и This Is It подряд на сложности XD
description.brazilian: Complete "Believe" e "This Is It" no XD em seguida
description.french: Complétez Believe XD et This Is It XD à la suite
description.german: Schaffe Believe XD und This Is It XD hintereinander
description.italian: Completa prima Believe in difficoltà "XD", poi "This Is It"
description.japanese: XDの「Believe」とXDの「This Is It」を連続でクリアする
description.koreana: "Believe" XD 난이도와 "This Is It" XD 난이도를 연달아 통과
description.schinese: 一次性通过《Believe》与《This Is It》的XD难度
description.spanish: Completa "Believe" y "This Is It" (ambas en dificultad XD) de forma seguida
description.tchinese: 一次性通過《Believe》與《This Is It》

description.english: Complete New Game followed immediately by Final Boss on any difficulty
description.german: Schließe New Game und direkt im Anschluss Final Boss auf irgendeinem Schwierigkeitsgrad ab
description.french: Complétez New Game immédiatement suivi de Final Boss dans n'importe quelle difficulté
description.italian: Completa "New Game" e subito dopo "Final Boss" in qualsiasi difficoltà
description.koreana: 아무 난이도에서 "New Game" 완료 후 바로 "Final Boss" 완료
description.spanish: Completa "New Game" y seguidamente completa "Final Boss" en cualquier dificultad
description.schinese: 完成《New Game》后马上完成《Final Boss》
description.tchinese: 完成《New Game》後馬上完成《Final Boss》
description.russian: Пройти New Game, а затем Final Boss на любой сложности
description.japanese: いずれかの難易度で、「New Game」をクリアし、その後すぐに「Final Boss」をクリアする
description.brazilian: Complete "New Game" seguido imediatamente de "Final Boss" em qualquer dificuldade

description.japanese: すべてのエキスパート レベルを完了する

description.russian: Завершить все уровни на сложности XD
description.japanese: すべての XD レベルを完了する
description.brazilian: Complete todos os níveis XD

description.german: Schließe einen beliebigen Track auf RemiXD-Schwierigkeit ab
